gallery.description: Entry Way -Through the sliding glass doors and the door to your right.... You're home.
Sundance band of turkey's come and visit.  They live high in the trees at night and fly down every morning.
Sit on the couch and enjoy the fireplace.
New propane fireplace adds warmth and thermostate operated.
Kitchen looking into the dining area.
Newly installed large walk in shower upstairs.
Xtra Long Twin beds in the loft area upstairs.
Outside hot tub overlooking the creek.
Master Bedroom upstairs.  Second balcony overlooks the hot tub.  New Smart TV for watching movies.

description.name: TimpCreek Cottage on the Stream
description.summary: Embrace the epitome of convenience here at TimpCreek on the Stream where nature blends with luxury. A romantic escape, business gathering, adventure retreat, or refreshing getaway, this is where you belong. Leave your car behind upon arrival; a charming 3-minute stroll by the creek takes you to exquisite luxury dining, gift shop, art gallery, the Spa or your business meetings at the Resort.  And let's not forget the thrill of the Outlaw Ski Lift, right at the base of the resort. This is it!
description.notes:
We are a privately owned and operated vacation property within the  Sundance Resort.  Although we are not affiliated with the Resort itself, all activities and amenities are available for your use.  

TimpCreek is not a private stand alone structure and has another rental attached to it.  Each unit has it's own separate private entrances, parking space, decks, hot tub and outside areas.  

HOT TUB - Feel free to use the hot tub and adjust the temperature up or down as you like, but please do not adjust any other settings.  

PROPANE FIREPLACE - Remote Control adjusts fireplace to the termperature of your likiing, but please do not adjust other settings.  (Remote Control located above the thermostate on the wall to the left of the piano).
description.access: Upon arrival at TimpCreek, the building will be to your right and your disignated parking spot is the one to the right.  There is room for one car.  Should you need an additional space, please contact your host.
description.transit:
Once you arrive, you are walking distance to the Resorts amenities.  However, should you want to explore off mountain you will want to rent or drive a car.  FROM NOVEMBER 1 THRU APRIL 30 - FOUR WHEEL, ALL WHEEL OR CHARINS ARE REQUIRED.  

There are no grocery stores or gas stations at Sundance however in the directions, we give the location of the stores closest to us.
description.interaction:
Time away is so very important and we commit to do everything to make your time stress free.  
Prior to your arrival we turn lights on, add music to the television and adjust temperatures  to add to a cozy welcome when you enter. 

After your booking, Pamela, your mountain contact, will send you a text for easier communication and to make sure any urgent message can be communicated to you quickly.
description.neighbourhood:
Walk out the path from TimpCreek and turn left to go to the Resort.  When you get to the fork, go left again nd you will pass the Glass Blowers (seasonal), the Art Gallery for great gifts or to take a class,   Turn right at the fork and you will walk past the Private Screening Room, the Pond and then find the Outlaw Ski Lift and LookOut Aspre Restaurant o your right and the Resort Restaurants to your left.  

Or, walk out the path from Timp Creek and turn right, walk up the stairs to Timphaven Road.  The Spa is located just a short walk on the right side of Timphaven.
description.space:
Hand peeled logs, rustic beams, cozy fireplace, timber planked floors, and full of fun collections plus the warmth of furnishings from a time long past welcome you to this 2 bedroom, 2.5 bath santuary.  Set apart, but not remote, TimpCreek on the  Stream has easy all year access.  

Curl up in front of the propane fireplace for a cozy conversation or to read a book.  New classic inspired appliances make preparing a meal a delight and then dine at the dining room table while looking out at Mother Nature.  Should you have to get a bit of work done, there's a desk set up for your convenience.  Then.... go out and play.  

The kitchen deck with BBQ and table is perfect for outdoor dining.  

Main bedroom upstairs has direct access to a private deck in the trees overlooking the stream to enjoy your morning beverage or afternoon quiet respite.  The master bathroom upstairs has been newly renovated and has a spacious, tiled shower.  Towels and robes provided.  

The loft contains the second sleeping area with two extra long twin beds, and half bath that includes new washer and dryer.    

No matter what season you come to visit,  whether it's for the spring meadows laced with wild flowers, the smells and activities of summer,  the magnificence of autumn colors, or a blanket of the greatest snow on earth, every season invites you to return and stay one more time.  Make this your come back to destination.
